title: International Student Immunization Requirements | University Health Services | UC College of Medicine
cleaned_text: You are required to complete a MANDATORY health screening upon your arrival. These screenings will take place at University Health Services, located in the Lindner Athletic Center. This screening is required for admission to classes. The health screening includes three parts: UHS Registration Form, Tuberculosis (TB) screening, and proof of required immunizations. Part One: University Health Services Registration Part Two: TB Screening requires a blood test to rule out tuberculosis. To sign up for your UC Health MyChart account now, use this link: UC Health MyChart Signup Please use "000-00-0000" when asked for your social security number. We will accept a TB blood test from your home country that was completed in the three months prior the start of classes. Bring these records with you to your TB screening appointment. **Failure to complete your TB screening by September 11, 2023 will result in you being reported to the Office of Student Conduct & Community Standards for further evaluation based on your potential violation of the Student Code of Conduct.** Part Three: Proof of Required Immunizations Hepatitis B: 3 Hepatitis B vaccine doses OR 2 Heplisav-B doses OR Hepatitis B surface antibody (HBSAB) titer* A (Meningococcal Quadrivalent): One dose if you are 16 to 21 years of age. Dose must be given on/after 16th birthday. Tuberculosis: IGRA blood test (QuantiFERON or T-Spot) Tdap (Tetanus, Diphtheria, Acellular Pertussis): One dose given within the past 10 years. Varicella: 2 vaccine doses OR Varicella antibody (VZVIgG) titer* * A titer is a laboratory test that measures the presence and amount of antibodies in blood. A titer may be used to prove immunity to disease. Visit Med Proctor and click "Register for a New Account." Use your University of Cincinnati email address. Select Requirement Group: International You can obtain the immunization form here (PDF) or click on the University of Cincinnati Required Form tab. Upload your completed immunization form to Med+Proctor. You will receive an email confirmation from Med+Proctor once the forms have been reviewed. Tips and Information for Successful Upload of Records: Richard E. Lindner Center2751 O'Varsity Way,
